Authors:
Yao-Yao Li, Man-Man Wang, Marizeth Groenewald, Yun-Tong
Guo, Feng Wu, Ai-Hua Li, Eiji Tanaka, Qi-Ming Wang, Dominik Begerow
Title:
Proposal of twenty-one new species and four new genera for
the anamorphic basidiomycetous yeast species in Ustilaginomycotina
Keywords:
Ustilaginomycotina, yeasts, smuts, new taxa, molecular
phylogeny
Abstract:
244 ustilaginomycetous yeast or yeast-like strains were
isolated from soil, skin of animal or human, and plant material during
the past 20 years. Among them, 202 strains represent 38 known species,
whereas 42 strains represent 21 novel species based on the sequence
analyses of the rDNA genes (18S rDNA, ITS regions, 26S rDNA D1/D2
domain) and three protein genes (RPB1, RPB2 and TEF1). In this study
several novelties, one order, one family, four genera and 21 species are
proposed.
